snippet.title: FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage - 2023 Re-Release Trailer
snippet.description:
FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage - Collector's Edition is exclusive to ZOOM Platform and includes 360 Degree 3D Screenshots, Cheat Sheet, Concept Art, Driver Biographies, Technical Featurette and 1080P Wallpaper!

Click the following link to purchase: https://www.zoom-platform.com/product/flatout-ultimate-carnage

FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage lifts demolition racing to a whole new level of bone-breaking slaughter!

Experience unparalleled destruction with metal crunching, bone breaking crashes and high octane racing with DeathMatch Derbies, Carnage and Beat The Bomb modes.

Catapult your Ragdoll character right through the windshield, into rings of fire, bowling pins, basketball nets and more in 12 hilarious and crazy mini-games! Choose from 12 drivers, 48 cars and 39 tracks!

Peerless real-world physics engine combines vehicles built from 40 plus deformable parts with over 8,000 destructible objects per track.

Wreck your way through 3 classes to become the ultimate FlatOut champion. Smash your way across parched deserts, massive storm drains and narrow city streets.

Fly through your windshield, or even better, the other driver's!

See every scratch and dent with real-time environment mapping to create a grittier realistic appearance.

FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage features dynamic shadow maps for every 3D object on the track including buildings, scenery and cars making all movement exceptionally smooth.

*NOTE: Multi-Player is currently disabled. However, it may be added at a later date.

© 2008 Bugbear Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. © 2015 Strategy First. All Rights Reserved. © 2023 Jordan Freeman Group and Strategy First. All Rights Reserved.
